param.name: hrStatus
param.para: The status code for the operation. If the value is an error code, the output file might be invalid.

returns.para: Returns an HRESULT value. Currently, the sink writer ignores the return value.

remarks.para: This interface is available on Windows Vista if Platform Update Supplement for Windows Vista is installed.

param.name: dwStreamIndex
param.para: The zero-based index of the stream. This parameter equals the value of the dwStreamIndex parameter in the method.

param.name: pvContext
param.para: The application-defined value that was given in the pvContext parameter in the method.

returns.para: Returns an HRESULT value. Currently, the sink writer ignores the return value.

remarks.para: This interface is available on Windows Vista if Platform Update Supplement for Windows Vista is installed.

summary.para: Callback interface for the Microsoft Media Foundation sink writer.

remarks.para: Set the callback pointer by setting the MF_SINK_WRITER_ASYNC_CALLBACK attribute when you first create the sink writer.
The callback methods can be called from any thread, so an object that implements this interface must be thread-safe.
This interface is available on Windows Vista if Platform Update Supplement for Windows Vista is installed.
